biotools.summary: ncFANs v2.0 is an integrative platform for functional annotation of non-coding RNAs. NcFANs v2.0 is an updated and full-featured platform for the functional annotation of noncoding RNAs (ncRNAs), which comprises three major modules: ncFANs-CHIP, ncFANs-NET and ncFANs-eLnc.
